title: Salvage Kings
overview: Meet the team at Priestly Demolition, a family business with a big heart and with over 250 jobs a year. There are countless treasures to be found before the wrecking ball moves in. Once the buildings are stripped and the last brick has fallen the salvage team embarks on the fun, fast and furious auctioning and sale of the items discovered and we soon learn that people will pay for the strangest things.
